requester.msg.increase.approve: BOT was approved to join group %group% by user %operator%
requester.msg.increase.invite: BOT was invited to join group %group% by user %operator%
requester.msg.decrease.kick: BOT was kicked from group %group% by admin %operator%
requester.msg.admin.set: BOT was set as admin of group %group% by user %operator%
requester.msg.admin.unset: BOT was unset as admin of group %group% by user %operator%
requester.msg.ban.ban: BOT was banned for %time% minutes in group %group% by user %operator%
requester.msg.ban.lift_ban: BOT's ban was lifted in group %group% by user %operator%
requester.msg.recall.group.self: User %user% recalled a message in group %group%: %message%
requester.msg.recall.group.other: User %user%'s message was recalled in group %group% by user %operator%: %message%
requester.msg.request.group.add: BOT received add group %group% request from user %user%: %message%
requester.msg.request.group.invite: BOT received invite to join group %group% from user %user%
requester.msg.request.private: BOT received friend request from user %user%: %message%
